description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) scheduling arrangements and additional temporary train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)車務調度及加開臨時列車車次

2026-01-28T16:52:00.CONTENT_EN: In response to the demand, the High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) train service will be adjusted as follows: • Temporary sleeper train trips will be added on 11, 12, 19, 24, 25 Feb & 4, 5 Mar: o To Beijingxi: G898 o From Beijingxi: G897 • To facilitate the above adjustments, the following sleeper train trips will be suspended on 15, 16 Feb: o To Beijingxi: G898 o From Beijingxi: G897 o To Shanghai Hongqiao: G900 o From Shanghai Hongqiao: G899 • Temporary train trips will be added on 13-15 & 18-23 Feb: o To Futian: G5834, G5836, G5838, G5840, G5842, G5844, G5846, G5848, G5850, G5852, G5854, G5856, G5868 o From Futian: G5833, G5835, G5837, G5839, G5841, G5843, G5845, G5847, G5849, G5851, G5853, G5855, G5867 • Schedules of some train trips will be adjusted from 2 Feb to 14 Mar Purchase your tickets up to 15 days ahead of travel: • 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app • Appointed travel agents • Hong Kong West Kowloon Station o Self-service Ticket Machines: bring valid and original travel documents of all passengers; only e-payment methods are accepted (for example, contactless credit cards, WeChat Pay or Alipay) o Ticketing Counters: may require a longer waiting time Train schedules: • 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app • High Speed Rail website or mobile app
2026-01-28T16:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 配合客運需求，高速鐵路(香港段)列車服務將作出以下調整： •2 月11、12、19、24、25 日及3 月4、5 日將加開以下臨時臥鋪列車車次： o 前往北京西：G898 o 由北京西出發：G897 •配合上述調整，以下臥鋪列車車次將於2 月15、16日停運： o 前往北京西：G898 o 由北京西出發：G897 o 前往上海虹橋：G900 o 由上海虹橋出發：G899 •2 月13至15日、18至23日將加開以下臨時列車車次： o 前往福田：G5834、G5836、G5838、G5840、G5842、G5844、G5846、G5848、G5850、G5852、G5854、G5856、G5868 o 由福田出發：G5833、G5835、G5837、G5839、G5841、G5843、G5845、G5847、G5849、G5851、G5853、G5855、G5867 •2 月2日至3 月14日部份列車班次時間調整。 如需購買15天內的車票： •12306官方網站（12306.cn）或手機應用程式 •指定代理 •前往香港西九龍站 o 使用自助售票機：需帶備所有乘車人士的有效旅遊證件正本；只接受電子支付（如感應式信用卡、微信支付或支付寶） o 使用票務櫃位：可能需要輪候較長時間 列車服務詳情： •12306官方網站（12306.cn）或手機應用程式 •高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Temporary road closure arrangement for SUUNTO SPARK RUN
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: SUUNTO SPARK RUN活動期間的臨時封路安排

2026-01-29T09:00:00.CONTENT_EN: 1. To facilitate the holding of the SUUNTO SPARK RUN from 31 January 2026 (Saturday) to 1 February 2026 (Sunday), temporary road closures will be implemented at Pak Tam Chung and Sai Kung Man Yee Road, Sai Kung: (i) The section of Tai Mong Tsai Road between Pak Tam Chung Physically Handicapped and Able-bodied Site and Pak Tam Road will be closed from 7.55 am to 8.10 am daily; and (ii) The section of Pak Tam Road from its junction with Tai Mong Tsai Road to a point about 230 metres north of the same junction will be closed from 7.55 am to 8.10 am daily. 2. During the road closure, all vehicular traffic (including franchised buses, green minibuses and taxis) will be prohibited to enter the aforementioned road sections, until the reopening of the road. Visitors should plan their journeys well in advance, pay attention to on-site instructions, and observe their safety. Departments concerned have maintained close liaison with the event organiser and have been steering the GMB operator for early preparations, so that vehicles would be deployed in advance for the service enhancement after the road reopens to meet passenger demand, in co-ordination with the Police's traffic control measures to ease passenger flow. 3. Other temporary road and traffic control measures, including adjusting the extent of road closures and alteration or suspension of public transport services, may be implemented by the Police at short notice depending on the actual traffic conditions. The TD appeals to the public to pay attention to the temporary road closures and public transport service adjustment arrangements. Members of the public who plan to go to the affected areas should plan their journey in advance, allow sufficient travelling time to avoid unexpected delay. Motorists and visitors should exercise patience and follow the instructions of the Police on-site.
2026-01-29T09:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 1.為配合2026年1月31日(星期六)至2月1日(星期日)舉行的SUUNTO SPARK RUN活動，當局將於活動期間在西貢大網仔路及北潭路實施以下臨時封路安排： (一)大網仔路介乎北潭涌傷健樂園及北潭路之間的路段將於每日上午7時55分至上午8時10分臨時封閉；及 (二)北潭路由其與大網仔路交界處起至同一交界以北約230米處止的路段將於每日上午7時55分至上午8時10分臨時封閉。 2.封路期間，所有車輛（包括專營巴士、專線小巴及的士）不得進入上述路段，直至道路重開為止。遊人應及早計劃行程，留意現場指示，並注意安全。相關部門已與活動主辦單位緊密聯繫，並督導小巴營辦商做好部署，預先調配車輛在道路重開後加強服務以應付乘客需求，並配合警方實施的交通管制措施以疏導乘客。 3.警方會視乎現場實際路面情況而在短時間內實施其他臨時道路及交通管制措施，包括調整封路範圍和更改或暫停公共運輸服務。運輸署呼籲市民留意臨時封路及公共運輸服務改動安排。市民應及早計劃行程及預留額外的時間以免延誤。駕駛人士及遊人請保持忍讓，並遵從在場警務人員的指示。
